tr.td: MU wins toss and defers. FC elects to receive. MU to defend south goal
Andrew Coe kickoff 52 yards to the FC13, Alex Smith return 18 yards to the FC31 (Loche Daiss).
Chase Burton sacked for loss of 6 yards to the FC25 (Dan Heim).
Chase Burton pass incomplete to L. Wroblewski, dropped pass.
Chase Burton pass complete to Dylan Jenney for 13 yards to the FC38 (Taylor Anglemye).
